about_the_game:
Ready to test your rhythm skills? Hentai is a thrilling rhythm game where every beat counts! Match the notes that appear in sync with the rhythm, and don’t miss—each mistake will reduce your score. The higher your level, the more notes you’ll need to hit perfectly.

With gradually increasing difficulty, Rithme offers challenges for both beginner and veteran rhythm game players. Feel the adrenaline as the speed and complexity ramp up. Can you keep the rhythm and achieve the Maximum Level?

And, an addictive arcade game where you must help a slime dodge obstacles and survive for as long as possible! Jump over trees that constantly appear in front of you while collecting points with every passing second. But be careful, one collision with a tree, and all your points will be lost instantly!

Main Features:

  • Fast-paced, challenging gameplay: Match notes perfectly to achieve the highest score!

  • Progressive difficulty: The higher your level, the more notes you’ll have to face.

  • Levels: Level up and unlock each animation scene there.

  • Simple yet challenging gameplay: With just one button, control your slime to jump at the right moment.

  • Cheerful and colorful graphics: Enjoy a vibrant world with a fun visual style.

  • Endless challenge: The longer you survive, the faster you’ll score and level up.

  • Easy to learn, hard to master: Perfect for casual players and hardcore gamers seeking a tougher challenge.

How long can you last? Test your reflexes and speed in Hentai now!

Welcome to the world of challenging theft! In Thief, you will enter mysterious houses to search for keys and collect hidden money. Prepare yourself for an exhilarating adventure, where cleverness and strategy are the keys to success.

Main Features:

  • Key Search: Explore every corner of the house and find the necessary keys to unlock doors and access new areas.

  • Collect Money: Discover hidden cash in various locations. Every decision you make can determine the success of the mission!

  • Interactive Environment: Use various objects around you to hide your tracks and escape from tricky situations.

  • Stunning Graphics: Enjoy breathtaking visuals with realistic details, immersing you in a tension-filled world of theft.

Join this journey and prove that you are the best thief! Are you ready to unlock the secrets hidden within each house and claim your wealth?

Take on the challenge now!

content_descriptors.notes: The adult content there is Blowjob, Paizuri and Sex with dialogue there and plus there is a challenge to open each adult content

name: Hentai X Thief

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: ntel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Find the key and take everything! Nothing can stand in your way. You are the greatest thief— or so you believe. Want to prove it? Show your skills here! Of course, there’s something exciting waiting for you. ;)
